title: Women's Wide Band Hair Bonnet Cap for Sleeping Head Cover Bonnet Night Sleep Hat (yellow)
features: It flatters all complexions while protecting your hair to ensure you wake up with the most beautiful curls

Great for holding natural hair, curly hair, braids, weaves, rollers, hair clamps, long and short hair, and up-dos
description: NO SLIP: Adjustable size feature neatly tucked inside the rear hat band ensures a secure fit so it stays put on your head. The durable elastic band is a smooth comfortable material that lays flat and leaves no marks. Will stay secure all night. All bonnets are designed to accommodate an average adult sized head.Many colors to choose from. This bonnet allows you not only preserve your hair from day to day but protect your hair while you sleep, shower or lounge around the house.
